Hey friends, building this site has been a several-month project. I had a lot of stops and starts, but in the end, I persevered and itâ€™s finally finished.

This blog is built using static HTML and CSS and is hosted on Netlify. It automatically deploys when I commit changes to the public GitHub repo.

When adding new posts, changing the design, or adding new features, that is done in VS Code.

New posts are written in Markdown in Drafts and copied as HTML to add to a new post in VS Code.
